# Histogram plots of variables


```{r, warning=FALSE,  message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}

summary(drug.df$UDPYOPI)
ggplot(aes(x = UDPYOPI), data = drug.df) +
  geom_histogram(color = "azure3", fill = "aquamarine4")
```
